name: Ladybug!
description:
The most fun game of 2018! Help the Ladybug to go home. Stay away from enemy objects.
Move the Ladybug with one finger to protect. Escape objects and reach higher and higher!
Game is very easy but it's very hard to reach high scores! (Believe me i played every levels)
Challenge your friends for the highest score!

Game Features:
- Free to play
- One finger control
- Different levels and experience every time
- Endless and level mode gameplay
